author: rse
msg: Bump up MAX_ENV_FLAGS in mod_rewrite.h from the too conservatice limit of
5 to 10 because there are some users out there who always have 5 to 8
variables in one RewriteRule and had to patch mod_rewrite.h for every
release. So 15 should be now more than enough, even for them. (I never
needed more than 4 in my RewriteRules ;-)

author: martin
msg: Add proxy Via: header management. Currently, Via: headers can be left
unchanged (compatibility), can be set to protocol and host only,
or to protocol, host and comment. Optionally, all Via: headers can
be suppressed if intranet privacy in companies is desired when going out
